description: First up, Chairwoman of the FTC, Edith Ramirez, talks about cramming and AT&T's $80 million settlement. Plus, BBC reporter, Theo Leggett, joins host Ben Johnson to discuss why some manufacturers devote time and money to building futuristic cars that no-one will ever be able to buy.
teaser: First up, Chairwoman of the FTC, Edith Ramirez, talks about cramming and AT&T's $80 million settlement. Plus, BBC reporter, Theo Leggett, joins host Ben Johnson to discuss why some manufacturers devote time and money to building futuristic cars that no-one will ever be able to buy.
title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, October 9, 2014
